alert.note: Alert for Kenosha; Racine; Walworth (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 04 at 10:54PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Walworth, southwestern Racine and Kenosha Counties through 1145 PM CDT... At 1054 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Bohners Lake, or 8 miles northwest of Paddock Lake, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Kenosha, Pleasant Prairie, Antioch, Lake Geneva, Union Grove, Paddock Lake, Camp Lake, Winthrop Harbor, Twin Lakes, Spring Grove, Rochester, Wheatland, Genoa City, Silver Lake, Richmond, Channel Lake, Lake Catherine, Powers Lake, Browns Lake and Pell Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 300 AM CDT for southeastern Wisconsin.
